posts.post_content:
Nice looking group with a couple VG and some trimmed cards that look EX.  The Gray could be trimmed, but I think it's just a really nice EX condition diamond cut.  Willetts has a partial 2nd name on top.  Willetts has a tiny wrinkle on the bottom right corner and Spade has a crease on the top left corner.  The others are all crease-free.

Paypal f/f.

Nice cards Luke, I'll take them.

Thanks.

PM coming.

Luke,

Rec'd a message that your PM mailbox is full, I sent you an email.

Thank you.
